original_text: A mother ostrich leaves her eggs on the ground. She lets the sand cause them to be warm. A mother ostrich leaves her eggs on the ground. She lets the sand cause them to be warm. A mother ostrich leaves her eggs on the ground.
korean_text: 그것이 알을 땅에 버려두어 흙에서 더워지게 하고

sentences.original_text: A mother ostrich leaves her eggs on the ground.
She lets the sand cause them to be warm.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 모래가 알을 따뜻하게 하도록 합니다.

sentences.original_text: A mother ostrich leaves her eggs on the ground.
She lets the sand cause them to be warm.
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 모래가 알을 따뜻하게 하도록 합니다.

sentences.original_text: A mother ostrich leaves her eggs on the ground.
